,if(node.id is null,null,1) as is_read_only

select node.*
,if(node.id is null,null,if(node.is_design = 1 and (node.owner_user_id is null or node.owner_user_id = #{userId}),0,1)) as is_read_only
,if(node.id is null,null,1) as is_read_only

select node.*
,if(node.id is null,null,if(node.is_design = 1 and (node.owner_user_id is null or node.owner_user_id = #{userId}),0,1)) as is_read_only
,if(node.id is null,null,1) as is_read_only
,file.file_type_id ,file.file_version ,file.file_checksum ,file.major_id ,file.main_file_id ,file.server_type_id ,file.server_address ,file.read_file_scope ,file.read_file_key ,file.write_file_scope ,file.write_file_key ,server_type.content as server_type_name ,major_type.content as major_name ,his.remark as file_remark from maoding_storage_node node inner join maoding_storage_file file on (substring(node.id from 0 to 32) = file.id) inner join maoding_const server_type on (server_type.classic_id = 19 and file.server_type_id = server_type.value_id) left join maoding_const major_type on (major_type.classic_id = 22 and file.major_id = major_type.value_id) left join maoding_storage_file_his his on (file.id = his.id)
order by (length(replace(node.path,'/','//')) - length(node.path)) desc limit 1

select node.*
,if(node.id is null,null,if(node.is_design = 1 and (node.owner_user_id is null or node.owner_user_id = #{userId}),0,1)) as is_read_only
,if(node.id is null,null,1) as is_read_only
,file.file_type_id ,file.file_version ,file.file_checksum ,file.major_id ,file.main_file_id ,file.server_type_id ,file.server_address ,file.read_file_scope ,file.read_file_key ,file.write_file_scope ,file.write_file_key ,server_type.content as server_type_name ,major_type.content as major_name ,his.remark as file_remark ,all_his.id as history_id ,all_his.file_id ,all_his.last_modify_user_id as user_id ,all_his.last_modify_duty_id as role_id ,all_his.action_type_id, ,unix_timestamp(ifnull(all_his.last_modify_time,0)) as action_time_stamp ,date_format(all_his.last_modify_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as action_time_text ,all_his.remark ,action_type.content as action_name ,action_user.user_name as user_name from maoding_storage_node node inner join maoding_storage_file file on (substring(node.id from 0 to 32) = file.id) inner join maoding_const server_type on (server_type.classic_id = 19 and file.server_type_id = server_type.value_id) left join maoding_const major_type on (major_type.classic_id = 22 and file.major_id = major_type.value_id) left join maoding_storage_file_his his on (file.id = his.id) left join maoding_storage_file_his all_his on (file.main_file_id = all_his.file_id and file.last_modify_time >= all_his.last_modify_time) left join maoding_const action_type on (action_type.classic_id = 20 and his.action_type_id = action_type.value_id) left join maoding_web_account action_user on (his.last_modify_user_id = acction_user.id)
order by (length(replace(node.path,'/','//')) - length(node.path)) desc limit 1

and (task.id = #{taskId})

and (file.id = #{id})

select node.*
,if(node.id is null,null,if(node.is_design = 1 and (node.owner_user_id is null or node.owner_user_id = #{userId}),0,1)) as is_read_only
,if(node.id is null,null,1) as is_read_only
from maoding_storage_node node
and (node.id = #{id})
and (node.path = #{path})

select 1 from maoding_storage_node node
and (node.pid = #{id})
and (node.path like concat(#{path},'/%'))
limit 1

select 1 from maoding_storage_root root
and (find_in_set(#{userId},root.user_id_list))
limit 1

select node.* ,concat('/',task.project_name,'/',classic_type.content,'/',task.path,'/',node.path) as full_path from maoding_storage node inner join maoding_const classic_type on (classic_type.classic_id = 24 and position(concat(':',node.type_id,':') in (classic_type.content_extra)) > 0) inner join maoding_task task on (node.task_id = task.id) where (node.deleted = 0)
and (node.id = #{id})
and (node.pid = #{pid})
and (concat('/',task.project_name,'/',classic_type.content,'/',task.path,'/',node.path) = #{path})
and (node.type_id = #{typeId})
and (task.project_id = #{projectId})
and (classic_type.value_id = #{rangeId})
and (task.issue_id = #{issueId})
and (task.id = #{taskId})
and (task.company_id = #{companyId})
and (node.last_modify_user_id = #{ownerUserId})
and (node.last_modify_duty_id = #{ownerRoleId})
and (concat('/',task.project_name,'/',classic_type.content,'/',task.path,'/',node.path) = #{fuzzyPath} or #{fuzzyPath} like concat(concat('/',task.project_name,'/',classic_type.content,'/',task.path,'/',node.path),'/%'))
and (node.path like concat(#{parentPath},'/%'))
order by (length(replace(concat(concat('/',task.project_name,'/',classic_type.content,'/',task.path,'/',node.path)),'/','//')) - length(concat(concat('/',task.project_name,'/',classic_type.content,'/',task.path,'/',node.path)))) desc limit 1

select node.* from maoding_storage node where (node.deleted = 0)
and (node.id = #{id})
and (node.pid = #{pid})
and (node.node_name = #{name})
and (node.path = #{storagePath})
and (node.type_id = #{typeId})
and (node.last_modify_user_id = #{ownerUserId})
and (node.last_modify_duty_id = #{ownerRoleId})
and (node.path = #{fuzzyStoragePath} or #{fuzzyStoragePath} like concat(node.path,'/%'))
and (node.path like concat(#{parentStoragePath},'/%'))
order by (length(replace(node.path,'/','//')) - length(node.path)) desc limit 1

select * from maoding_storage_file file where (file.deleted = 0)
and (file.id = #{id})

select * from maoding_storage_file_his his where (his.deleted = 0)
and (his.id = #{id})

(node.deleted = 0)
